name: Silicon Invaders
description:
CREDITS ARE IN THE GAME STORY OF THE GAME

Welcome to the planet A-001. In This world it has only one plant. 1 year later you started to see invasion of silicon chips. you ran fast to go into your mecha and build walls in the place that is not infected.

GOAL

Your goal is to defend the most waves possible until you die by: no health, no battery left and no oxygen (the plant makes oxygen).

CONTROLS

Move around

W : move up

S : move down

Mouse: the rotation of the player will point at your mouse

CTRL, LEFT CLICK: Shoot, Place objects

Fun facts

at about 40 minute I read a wikipedia page about what si a plant and I discovered that trees are a plant, flower to, and more so technically I respect the special object with a flower
